name: The Overseer
description:
My submission for LDJAM 39. 

Gameplay:

*Match tiles to perform different actions to retain your position as The Overseer.

*Choose the right action to handle both innocent protesters and aggressive rioters. 

*See how long you can stay in power. 

This was my first ever game jam attempt. I wish I had more time to balance the gameplay but I am quite happy with the end result.  Hope you enjoy it . 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/the-overseer
